item.description:
There are many misconceptions regarding the teaching of nirvana. Many non-buddhists think it is akin to a heaven or a fantastical paradise in the afterlife. This talk/discussion will explore what the Buddha called "the unborn and uncreated" and what that means to our everyday spiritual life. Presented by Daikan.

 

Visit www.bffct.net

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.how_to_find_us: Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.why: ....because you can learn to transform suffering into liberation.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Buddhist Meetup Group - Topic: What is Nirvana?
